ftDropChild Struct Reference
[Route Under Mac (RUM)]

#include <mac.h>

Detailed Description

Frame used to notify a router that one of its children has re-associated with a new parent, and so the router should drop the child from its child table.

Definition at line 644 of file mac.h.
